text.text_translated: One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins was watching TV. She was changing the channels. At that time, there was a war in Iraq. She could only find two kinds of shows on TV. One kind of show was a 'reality' show. In these shows, young people tried to win a million dollars. The other kind of show was the news about the war. Suzanne says the two ideas mixed together in her head. It was a strange feeling. Then she had the idea for The Hunger Games.

best_attempt.text_translated:
One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins was watching TV. She was changing the channels. At that time, there was a war in Iraq. She could only find two kinds of shows on TV.

One kind of show was a 'reality' show. In these shows, young people tried to win a million dollars. The other kind of show was the news about the war.

Suzanne says the two ideas mixed together in her head. It was a strange feeling. Then she had the idea for The Hunger Games.
